title: IT Security Specialist
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

﻿Our Information Security professionals are passionate about information security and control solutions for computing environments. While managing a world-class team of technology experts, you'll partner with one or more disciplines, lines of business, regions or locations to respond to evolving business requirements and emerging threats. You'll also leverage your expert knowledge of today's ever-changing cybersecurity and risk landscape to influence IT operations across the firm. Responsibilities include offering guidance, best practices, and support across businesses, leading risk reviews and vulnerability assessments, identifying threats, communicating with senior leaders and other stakeholders, and managing budgets.

**Job responsibilities:**

* Build a vision around the next level of security maturity for the business you will work with inputs from the security organization and work with Product and Engineering Leaders to deliver on that vision. This vision must enable business outcomes and continuously raise the security bar and not one or the other.
* Serve as a cyber risk advisor to the leadership team you partner with and help the organization focus and prioritize on initiatives with the greatest ROI using the rich datasets we already have and standing up data systems if needed
* Partner with Engineering teams to solve complex problems on the cutting edge of fields like Payments and banking APIs
* Be an enabler and partner with application architects and engineering leaders to design secure, scalable and resilient applications
* Hiring, shaping and developing a team of cyber risk advisors that are tightly integrated into the business

**Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills**

* Experience in a successful security and risk organization with strong security and technical skills
* Security Solution Architecture
* *Experienced with microservices architecture, modern runtimes, a strong background in software engineering, and modern cloud constructs.*
* Technical Service Delivery
* Shipping code & features
* Strong strategic vision mixed with delivery excellence
* Ability to work with cross functional technology partners – engineering, architecture & product management
* Strong leader, culture carrier and team player experienced in matrix organizations
* Demonstrated experience with product technologies (i.e., Infrastructure, Application)
* Modern Architectures – (data, cloud, mobile, APIs, micro-services)
* Experience in financial services consumer businesses (i.e., Mortgages, Cards or Digital) preferred but not required
* Able to communicate effectively and authoritatively with technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Thinks in terms of risks and outcomes
* Banking experience preferred but experience in industries with similar risk tolerance is acceptable
* An experienced architect comfortable with full stack technologies
* Well versed in modern architectures (data, cloud, mobile, APIs, micro-services)
* Cyber subject matter expert able to earn the respect of technology leaders

**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  

  

The Cybersecurity & Technology Controls group at JPMorgan Chase aligns the firm’s cybersecurity, access management, controls and resiliency teams. The group proactively and strategically partners with all lines of business and functions to enable them to design, adopt and integrate appropriate controls; deliver processes and solutions efficiently and consistently; and drive automation of controls. The group’s number one priority is to enable the business by keeping the firm safe, stable and resilient.  

  

High Risk Roles (HRR) are sensitive roles within the technology organization that require high assurance of the integrity of staff by virtue of 1) sensitive cybersecurity and technology functions they perform within systems or 2) information they receive regarding sensitive cybersecurity or technology matters. Users in these roles are subject to enhanced pre-hire screening which includes both criminal and credit background checks (as allowed by law). The enhanced screening will need to be successfully completed prior to commencing employment or assignment.

title: Technical Authority – Digital, Product/software
description:
We’re AtkinsRéalis, a world-leading Design, Engineering and Project Management organization. Created by the integration of long-standing organizations dating back to 1911, we are a world-leading professional services and project management company dedicated to engineering a better future for our planet and its people. We create sustainable solutions that connect people, data and technology to transform the world's infrastructure and energy systems. We deploy global capabilities locally to our clients and deliver unique end-to-end services across the whole life cycle of an asset including consulting, advisory & environmental services, intelligent networks & cybersecurity, design & engineering, procurement, project & construction management, operations & maintenance, decommissioning and capital. The breadth and depth of our capabilities are delivered to clients in key strategic sectors such as Engineering Services, Nuclear, Operations & Maintenance and Capital.


News and information are available at www.atkinsrealis.com or follow us on LinkedIn.


Our teams are proud to deliver on some of the most prestigious projects across the world. It's thanks to our talented people and their diverse thinking, expertise and knowledge. Join us and you'll be part of our genuinely collaborative environment, where everyone is supported to make the most of their talents and expertise.  

When it comes to work-life balance, AtkinsRéalis is a great place to be. So, let's discuss how our flexible and remote working policies can support your priorities. We're passionate about are work while valuing each other equally. So, ask us about some of our recent pledges for Women's Equality and being a 'Disability Confident' and 'Inclusive Employer’.


In the wake of the data and AI revolution, the demand for digital professionals has surged exponentially. As businesses increasingly rely on data-driven insights and artificial intelligence technologies to gain a competitive edge, the need for AtkinsRéalis to provide skilled professionals adept in digital technologies across the globe is paramount.


Recognizing the abundance of talent in India, we are strategically shifting our focus to tap into this valuable resource pool. Embracing this shift will allow us to stay ahead in the ever-evolving digital landscape while fostering cross-cultural collaboration and diversity within our teams.


Our business and clients move fast, and our Digital practice needs to react quickly. This makes the space a challenging environment to work within, where we must balance speed of delivery with high quality output that unlocks real and lasting business outcomes whilst minimizing our risk exposure and protecting our commercial position.


As our Digital Technical Authority for our Global Technology Centre (GTC) in India, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the successful delivery of projects by shaping and executing our organization’s technical strategy. Your expertise will guide critical decisions, ensuring that our projects align with industry best practices, innovation, and quality standards. You’ll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, providing technical leadership and fostering a culture of excellence.


The Digital practice in the GTC consists of three practices Enabling Services, Data Intelligence and Technology Solutions. As the Technical Authority you will be the accountable for the technical delivery across all three practices. You will ensure that technical decisions are made with a balanced view of what good looks like, considering the buy, partner, build decision, technical development stack available, and data, security and IP considerations. You will engage heavily in the digital Global Technical Networks (GTNs), shaping these and aligning the GTC accordingly.


Enabling Services encompasses our digital internally managed services that support our wider business. Data Intelligence helps our clients set data strategy and governance, architect and manage their data and generate insight from it through artificial intelligence and powerful visualizations. Technology Solutions is our end-to-end service to help our clients integrate, deliver and run high quality technology their people embrace.


You will need to work with the Practice Leads in India, whilst collaborating closely with counterparts in our global regions to instill technical rigor into our development processes, coaching and mentoring junior staff so they are able to make better technical decisions day to day, whilst being the ultimate stop for more complex decisions.


This is a part-time team leadership role, and you will have a non-productive allowance to balance alongside your wider project delivery.

**Accountabilities**


You will be empowered to drive the success of Digital Practice, working collaboratively with colleagues across the Practice and wider business to shape and deliver the technical direction of the business. Specifically, you will have a big personal impact to:

* Develop and communicate a clear technical vision aligned with business goals, identifying emerging trends, technologies, and opportunities to enhance our technical capabilities.
* Mentor and inspire technical teams, promoting a growth mindset and continuous learning, setting technical standards, guidelines, and best practices across projects which drive innovation.
* Collaborate with Technical leadership from across the business, including the GTC Practice Leads and Global Technical Networks (GTNs) to develop, implement, and embed technical best practice into BAU delivery, liaising with regional capabilities to highlight opportunities to use novel technologies.
* Scope the technical solutions for our complex and/or high-risk projects, drawing on your industry experience to terminate strategic decisions that allow re-use, optimize delivery efficiency and comply to internal and external standards (e.g. security, data residency, preferred suppliers etc.).
* Proactively monitor and appropriately manage technical delivery risks, with a focus on protecting the GTC reputation with the wider business and our clients, solving and learning from issues as they arise.
* Streamline interfaces with other Practice areas, both within the GTC and more broadly, to enable high value integrated propositions, identifying complementary expertise and aligning ways of working to reduce barriers.

**Person profile**


You will be an experienced and excellent leader in providing a consultancy service to help teams optimize their overall program delivery using digital products and services. Beyond that, you will:

* Have a track record in setting and implementing strategy for a high performing service.
* Relish nurturing, developing and motivating teams to deliver excellence and realize growth.
* Care passionately about delighting clients through a collaborative style and quality delivery.
* Give behavior and culture at least as much emphasis as technical skills development.
* Think innovatively and creatively about the best way to solve clients’ problems.
* Be commercially astute, leveraging internal resource, intellectual property and supply chain.
* Communicate complex technical subjects clearly and concisely with a focus on benefits.


Keep abreast of the latest technical developments, and be able to integrate these into our delivery.


You will be able to demonstrate the following experience, skills, and qualifications:

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science or other relevant field (practical experience in lieu will be considered).
* Extensive experience in overseeing the design and development of large applications, including application development processes and quality control while coordinating multiple programmers.
* Extensive experience with current programming techniques, development tools, database design and/or administration of enterprise relational database management systems.
* Demonstrable experience operating using excellent interpersonal, technical writing and communications skills.
* An industry recognized certification, i.e., Microsoft Certified Solution Developer desired, or equivalent.

**What We Can Offer You**

* Varied, interesting and meaningful work.
* A hybrid working environment with flexibility and great opportunities.
* Opportunities for training and, as the team grows, career progression or sideways move.
* An opportunity to work within a large global multi-disciplinary consultancy on a mission to change the ways we approach business as usual**.**

**Why work for AtkinsRéalis?**  

We at AtkinsRéalis are committed to developing its people both personally and professionally. Our colleagues have the advantage of access to a high ranging training portfolio and development activities designed to help make the best of individual’s abilities and talents. We also actively support staff in achieving corporate membership of relevant institutions.

**Meeting Your Needs**  

To help you get the most out of life in and outside of work, we offer employees ‘Total Reward’.
  

Making sure you're supported is important to us. So, if you identify as having a disability, tell us ahead of your interview, and we’ll discuss any adjustments you might need.

**Additional Information**  

We are an **equal opportunity, drug-free employer** committed to promoting a diverse and inclusive community - a place where we can all be ourselves, thrive and develop. To help embed inclusion for all, from day one, we offer a range of family friendly, inclusive employment policies, flexible working arrangements and employee networks to support staff from different backgrounds. As an Equal Opportunities Employer, we value applications from all backgrounds, cultures and ability.


We care about your privacy and are committed to protecting your privacy. Please consult our Privacy Notice on our Careers site to know more about how we collect, use and transfer your Personal Data.


Link: Equality, diversity & inclusion | Atkins India (atkinsrealis.com)

**Accountabilities**


You will be empowered to drive the success of the Digital Practice, working collaboratively with colleagues across the Practice and wider business to uphold quality delivery. Specifically, you will have a big personal impact to:

* Scope the delivery approach of our complex and/or high-risk projects, drawing in experts from across the Digital practice in GTC and more widely, to ensure our holistic approach appropriately balances speed, quality, risk, resource capabilities and commercial position and we set ourselves up for success.
* Ensure the GTC Technical Authority is adequately aware of, and appropriately managing, technical delivery risks, with a focus on protecting the GTC reputation with the wider business and our clients.
* Streamline interfaces with other Practice areas, both within the GTC and more broadly, to enable high value integrated propositions, identifying complementary expertise and aligning ways of working to reduce barriers.

* Ensure the adherence of project delivery to company and regional governance processes (such as the SMS, TDF, DIP) and take regional ownership to ensure their fitness for purpose, actively contributing to their continued development to ensure they are meeting business needs.
* Establish and be accountable for the quality review cadence for technical delivery, encompassing quality reviews and audits and working with our internal quality teams and leveraging industry best practice to continually uphold quality delivery from the practice.

In the wake of the data and AI revolution, the demand for digital professionals has surged exponentially. As businesses increasingly rely on data-driven insights and artificial intelligence technologies to gain a competitive edge, the need for AtkinsRéalis to provide skilled professionals adept in digital technologies across the globe is paramount.


Recognizing the abundance of talent in India, we are strategically shifting our focus to tap into this valuable resource pool. Embracing this shift will allow us to stay ahead in the ever-evolving digital landscape while fostering cross-cultural collaboration and diversity within our teams.


Our clients are awash with data, but often struggle to realize the business value from it. Our Technology Solutions teams work collaboratively with our clients to develop innovative technology solutions to their complex problems. We support clients across many industry sectors, and see our Indian talent being integral to delivery for our Energy, Water and Transport clients in particular.


As our Practice Lead for Technology Solutions in our Global Technology Centre (GTC) in India, your purpose will be to lead a high value end-to-end client service from user experience design, product management and solution architecture through to integration, development, test and service management. The service helps our clients implement high-quality, user centric, technologies that can are confidently developed, scaled, and adapted, and can be transitioned, transformed, and operated to deliver business outcomes. We’re vendor-agnostic, meaning we’re not tied to any platform or software. We enable our clients to find and integrate the most cost-effective solution for their unique needs. User buy-in is key, which we achieve through embedding modern user-centric design methods at the heart of what we do.


The Technology Solutions service is part of our Digital practice. It sits alongside two other services: Data Intelligence and Enabling Services. Data Intelligence helps our clients set data strategy and governance, architect and manage their data and generate insight from it through artificial intelligence and powerful visualizations. Enabling Services encompasses our digital internally managed services that support our wider business.


You will need to work with the other Practice Leads in India, whilst collaborating closely with your counterparts in our global regions to: attract, develop and retain talent; manage project delivery to exceptional quality standards; define and strengthen capabilities and service lines; and manage our commercial, operational and risk indicators. * Mature the technical capabilities of the practice, being a respected technical leader in multiple capabilities and able to identify and empower others within your team to share knowledge and mentor new and junior team members for the betterment of the practice.
* Ensure efficient utilization and growth of the resource pool within the Practice in conjunction with the Practice Resource Manager, stretching our talent to meet and exceed their growth aspirations.
* Actively participate and provide both technical and leadership contributions toward the Technology Solutions Global Technical Network (GTN).
* Collaborate with Market/Client teams, and our GTC Digital Growth Lead to drive sales for the service, and shape the delivery approach, working with Marketing to ensure that practice collateral clearly articulates the service offering and ensuring our delivery approach minimizes risk whilst maximizing value.
* Streamline interfaces with other Practice areas, both within the GTC and more broadly, to enable high value integrated propositions, identifying complementary expertise and aligning ways of working to reduce barriers.
* Ensure consistently high-quality delivery that delights our clients despite inevitable setbacks, driving the adoption of modern methods in all client engagements, capturing insights to embed continuous improvement and shifting towards a service-oriented business model.
* Maintain a horizonal view with respect to advancements in technology solutions within the wider industry and proactively bring new ideas and evolutionary concepts into technical and marketing discussions to prompt new ways of thinking and competitive advantages.

**Person profile**


You will be an experienced and excellent leader in providing a consultancy service to help clients design, develop and operate high quality technology solutions. Beyond that, you will:

* Be a recognized and respected technical leader in many of the capability lines of the practice.
* Have a track record in setting and implementing strategy for a high performing client service.

* Care passionately about delighting clients through a collaborative style and quality delivery.

title: Module Lead
description:
Date: Feb 22, 2024
Job Requisition Id: 55725
Location:
Hyderabad, TG, IN Indore, IN Pune, IN
YASH Technologies is a leading technology integrator specializing in helping clients reimagine operating models, enhance competitiveness, optimize costs, foster exceptional stakeholder experiences, and drive business transformation.

  


At YASH, we’re a cluster of the brightest stars working with cutting-edge technologies. Our purpose is anchored in a single truth – bringing real positive changes in an increasingly virtual world and it drives us beyond generational gaps and disruptions of the future.

  


**We are looking forward to hire Informatica MDM Professionals in the following areas :**

  


**Experience**
--------------



4-6 Years


**Job Description**
-------------------


**Responsibilities:**


4-6 years of Professional experience with minimum 3 years of equivalent experience in developing/building and configuring MDM solutions.  

Build, Configure and Deploy the scalable, highly available and reliable solution for managing Global Master Data Domains.  

Drive the Build and support/Hypercare for integration of MDM tool with other systems by coordinating with respective technical architects and Business Analysts/Product Owners.  

Ensure the solution and code meet the NFRs and desired performance needs.  

Lead functional understanding, work with Business on writing SIT/UAT test cases, execute technical test cases and approve the final solution from the technical team.  

Create and review Technical Design Documents, Support Documents (Post deployment)  

Participate/Lead training sessions for the users/Data Stewards who would use the MDM solution.  

Drive Global data management and data quality Capabilities.  

Participate in conceptualizing, designing and execution of master data management initiatives  

Work with Enterprise Architect, Solution Architect to deliver innovative, efficient and cost-effective MDM solutions to meet enterprise needs.  

Understand and apply the technical “best practices”.  

Design and implement the solution for Hierarchies (customer, Product, Material, Supplier), data unification and standardization.

  

  

**Technical Skills:**


4-6 years of Professional experience with minimum 3 years of equivalent experience in developing/building and configuring MDM solutions.  

Experience in integration using Rest APIs, is desirable.  

Should have experience in creating technical design document.  

Exposure to MDM Architecture with systems architecture design/implementation.  

2+ years of experience with Agile software development.  

Should be excellent team player and should have worked across one or more of Master Data domains – Customer, vendor, finance, material and product.  

Exposure to Data Governance and Data Quality best practices.  

 Experience working in Automotive and/or manufacturing environment is a plus.  

Experience with hybrid (cloud/on premises) integration architecture patterns is highly desired.  

Experience in working with Cloud platforms such as Azure or Snowflake.  

Ability to work independently with minimum supervision.  

Experience in leading development/implementation of Master Data technologies such as EnterWorks, Stibo, Reltio, MDG, Informatica MDM, MDS, HANA Information Steward, DQ Reporting.  

Hands on experience in EnterWorks MDM tool is a plus and preferred.  

Strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills.


**Required Technical Competencies**
-----------------------------------


**Domain/ Industry Knowledge:**


* Basic knowledge of customer's business processes- relevant technology platform or product.
* Able to prepare process maps, workflows, business cases and simple business models in line with customer requirements with assistance from SME and apply industry standards/ practices in implementation with guidance from experienced team members.

**Requirement Gathering and Analysis:**


* Working knowledge of requirement management processes and requirement analysis processes, tools and methodologies.
* Able to analyse the impact of change requested / enhancement / defect fix and identify dependencies or interrelationships among requirements and transition requirements for the engagement.

**Product/ Technology Knowledge:**


* Working knowledge of technology product/platform standards and specifications.
* Able to implement code or configure/customize products and provide inputs in design and architecture adhering to industry standards/ practices in implementation.
* Analyse various frameworks/tools, review the code and provide feedback on improvement opportunities.

**Architecture tools and frameworks:**


* Basic knowledge of architecture Industry tools & frameworks
* Able to analyse available tools and frameworks for review by the SME and plan for tool configurations and development.

**Architecture concepts and principles:**


* Basic knowledge of architectural elements, SDLC, methodologies.
* Able to apply various architectural constructs in the projects and identify various architectural patterns and implement.

**Analytics Solution Design:**


* High-level awareness of a wide range of core data science/analytics techniques, their advantages, disadvantages, and areas of application.

**Tools & Platform Knowledge:**


* Familiar with wide range of mainstream commercial and open-source data science/analytics software tools, their constraints, advantages, disadvantages, and areas of application.
* Familiar with programming languages (Eg. R or Python) and able to interpret an existing script of moderate complexity.
**Required Behavioral Competencies**
------------------------------------


**Accountability**: Takes responsibility for and ensures accuracy of own work, as well as the work and deadlines of the team.


**Collaboration:** Participates in team activities and reaches out to others in team to achieve common goals.


**Agility:** Demonstrates a willingness to accept and embrace differing ideas or perceptions which are beneficial to the organization.


**Customer Focus:** Displays awareness of customers stated needs and gives priority to meeting and exceeding customer expectations at or above expected quality within stipulated time.


**Communication:** Targets communications for the appropriate audience, clearly articulating and presenting his/her position or decision.


**Drives Results:** Sets realistic stretch goals for self & others to achieve and exceed defined goals/targets


**Certifications**
------------------


Good To Have  


At YASH, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. We leverage career-oriented skilling models and optimize our collective intelligence aided with technology for continuous learning, unlearning, and relearning at a rapid pace and scale.

  


**Our Hyperlearning workplace is grounded upon four principles**


* Flexible work arrangements, Free spirit, and emotional positivity
* Agile self-determination, trust, transparency, and open collaboration
* All Support needed for the realization of business goals,
* Stable employment with a great atmosphere and ethical corporate culture

title: Senior Consultant
description:
We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Senior Java Developer with 8-10 years of experience to join our innovative team. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Java, J2EE, Web Service, Microservices, Spring Boot, MQ, REST APIs, and Java with Test-Driven Development (TDD) experience. Additionally, expertise in AWS Cloud, Docker/Kubernetes, NoSQL databases, and optional knowledge of Kafka will be highly advantageous.
  

Key Responsibilities:
  

Java Development: Design, develop, and maintain high-quality Java applications and services.
  

Microservices Architecture: Architect and implement scalable and resilient microservices solutions.
  

Web Services: Develop and integrate RESTful web services to facilitate seamless communication between systems.
  

Spring Boot: Utilize Spring Boot for rapid development and deployment of Java-based applications.
  

Message Queues (MQ): Implement and manage message queue systems to enable asynchronous communication.
  

Test-Driven Development (TDD): Apply TDD principles to ensure robust and reliable code.
  

AWS Cloud: Leverage AWS Cloud services for building, deploying, and scaling applications.
  

Containerization and Orchestration: Work with Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration of applications.
  

NoSQL Databases: Utilize NoSQL databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
  

Optional - Kafka: Familiarity with Kafka for real-time event streaming (optional but highly desirable)**About Virtusa**



Teamwork, quality of life, professional and personal development: values that Virtusa is proud to embody. When you join us, you join a team of 30,000 people globally that cares about your growth — one that seeks to provide you with exciting projects, opportunities and work with state of the art technologies throughout your career with us.



Great minds, great potential: it all comes together at Virtusa. We value collaboration and the team environment of our company, and seek to provide great minds with a dynamic place to nurture new ideas and foster excellence.



Virtusa was founded on principles of equal opportunity for all, and so does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

title: Java Ms
description:
We are seeking a seasoned Full Stack Software Engineer with a minimum of 8 years of experience in Java, J2EE, Web Service, Microservices, Spring Boot/NodeJs, MQ/Kafka, REST APIs, Database technologies, and proficiency in React/Angular/VueJS. The ideal candidate should also have expertise in Java with Test-Driven Development (TDD), AWS cloud services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, step functions), Dockers/Kubernetes, and optionally GraphQL/GoLang.
  

  

Key Responsibilities:
  

  

Full Stack Development: Design and implement end-to-end solutions using Java, J2EE, and relevant front-end technologies (React/Angular/VueJS).
  

  

Microservices Architecture: Architect and develop microservices-based solutions with a focus on scalability and performance.
  

  

Spring Boot/NodeJs: Utilize Spring Boot or NodeJs for building robust and scalable backend systems.
  

  

Message Queue (MQ)/Kafka: Implement and integrate messaging systems for efficient communication between services.
  

  

REST APIs: Design and implement RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless interactions between different components.
  

  

Database Management: Design and optimize database structures, ensuring efficiency and reliability.
  

  

Front-End Technologies: Develop responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React, Angular, or VueJS.
  

  

Java with TDD: Apply Test-Driven Development principles to ensure the reliability and quality of code.
  

  

AWS Cloud Services: Deploy and manage applications on AWS, utilizing services like EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, and step functions.
  

  

Containerization and Orchestration: Implement and manage applications using Docker and Kubernetes for efficient deployment and scaling.
  

  

Optional - GraphQL/GoLang: Experience with GraphQL or GoLang is an added advantage.**About Virtusa**



Teamwork, quality of life, professional and personal development: values that Virtusa is proud to embody. When you join us, you join a team of 30,000 people globally that cares about your growth — one that seeks to provide you with exciting projects, opportunities and work with state of the art technologies throughout your career with us.



Great minds, great potential: it all comes together at Virtusa. We value collaboration and the team environment of our company, and seek to provide great minds with a dynamic place to nurture new ideas and foster excellence.



Virtusa was founded on principles of equal opportunity for all, and so does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

title: Module Lead
description:
Date: Feb 18, 2024
Job Requisition Id: 54623
Location:
Gurgaon, IN Pune, IN Bangalore, KA, IN Indore, MP, IN Indore, IN Hyderabad, IN Pune, MH, IN Bangalore, KA, IN
YASH Technologies is a leading technology integrator specializing in helping clients reimagine operating models, enhance competitiveness, optimize costs, foster exceptional stakeholder experiences, and drive business transformation.

  


At YASH, we’re a cluster of the brightest stars working with cutting-edge technologies. Our purpose is anchored in a single truth – bringing real positive changes in an increasingly virtual world and it drives us beyond generational gaps and disruptions of the future.

  


**We are looking forward to hire Salesforce Development Professionals in the following areas :**

  


* IT Experience: Min 8+ years
* Salesforce Experience: Min. 6 years +
* Hands-on experience in Salesforce B2B commerce cloud configurations & customizations:
	+ Campaigns, Promotions
	+ Product catalogue, Pricing configurations, product recommendations
	+ Assets and inventory mgmt.
	+ Account management – credit check, credit limit set-ups, credit-hold
	+ Quote and Order capture
	+ Cart configurations and cardinality rules, Check-out
	+ Customer communities
* Hands on technical skills - APEX coding, triggers, classes, LWC framework, Lightening Aura framework, Integrations etc
* Strong experience in code reviews, salesforce best practice implementations, coaching and mentoring juniors
* Well versed with Integrations (Inbound, out bound interfaces, REST & SOAP, Web-services, Inbound & Outbound interfaces, APIs) to define enterprise solutions along with salesforce best practices
* Certifications preferred:
	+ Salesforce B2B commerce cloud
	+ Salesforce Systems Architect
	+ Salesforce Application Architect

* Nice to Have:
	+ Industry Clouds – Consumer Good clouds, Manufacturing Cloud, health Cloud, , Field Service etc
	+ Experience on middleware – MuleSoft and DellBoomi will be additional advantage

At YASH, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. We leverage career-oriented skilling models and optimize our collective intelligence aided with technology for continuous learning, unlearning, and relearning at a rapid pace and scale.

  


**Our Hyperlearning workplace is grounded upon four principles**


* Flexible work arrangements, Free spirit, and emotional positivity
* Agile self-determination, trust, transparency, and open collaboration
* All Support needed for the realization of business goals,
* Stable employment with a great atmosphere and ethical corporate culture
